sentence.Network_en: The sisters were agreeably surprised to find out that the King of Spain had been their rescuer.
sentence.Network_cn: 姐妹们惊喜地发现西班牙国王曾经救过她们。

sentence.Network_en: The teacher is correcting the examination papers agreeably because all her students have done well in the examination.
sentence.Network_cn: 老师非常高兴地批改着考卷,因为她的学生都考得不错.

entry.def: If something is agreeable, it is pleasant and you enjoy it.

example.ex: ...workers in more agreeable and better paid occupations.
example.tran: 在条件更惬意、报酬更丰厚的行业工作的人

entry.tran: 亲切的;友善的;讨人喜欢的
entry.def: If someone is agreeable, they are pleasant and try to please people.

example.ex: ...sharing a bottle of wine with an agreeable companion...
example.tran: 与友善的同伴共饮一瓶酒

example.ex: I've gone out of my way to be agreeable to his friends.
example.tran: 我已然特意地去讨好他的朋友们。

entry.tran: 欣然同意的;令人赞同的
entry.def: If you are agreeable to something or if it is agreeable to you, you are willing to do it or to allow it to happen.

example.ex: She was agreeable to the project...
example.tran: 她对这个项目表示欣然同意。

example.ex: If you are agreeable, my husband's office will make all the necessary arrangements.
example.tran: 如果你同意，我丈夫的事务所将作出所有必要的安排。

auth_sentence.content: If only all their fellow countrymen could dine and coexist so agreeably.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: If only all their fellow countrymen could dine and coexist so agreeably.

auth_sentence.content: We can definitely talk about that when we meet, Palen said, agreeably.
auth_sentence.res_content: We can definitely talk about that when we meet, Palen said, agreeably.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We can definitely talk about that when we meet, Palen said, agreeably.

auth_sentence.content: Slim Baby has a glammy feel recalling early Marc Bolan, Remy singing in an agreeably louche rock'n'roll drawl.
